Package net.amoebaman.utils

Class Summary
ChatUtils This class contains utilities for working with Minecraft's chat box, to make pretty and understandable text easier to code.
CommandController Contains interfaces and methods for allowing other plugins to handle commands via annotated methods, much the same way that Bukkit currently handles events.
PlayerMap<V> A class that attempts to overcome the traditional aversion to using org.bukkit.entity.Player as the key type for a Map, namely that Player references can be quite large and we don't want to keep them around after they're gone unless necessary.
S_Loc Contains static methods for converting and reverting Locations to and from easily serializable and saveable forms.
StatusBarAPI Assorted methods for manipulating packets to spawn fake Ender Dragons and show players a status bar at the top of the screen using their health bar.
 

Enum Summary
ChatUtils.ColorScheme An enumeration of color schemes that can be used in conjuction with the formatting methods.
ParticleEffect Contains an enumeration of all available particle effects, and methods for sending them to players via packets.
 

Annotation Types Summary
CommandController.CommandHandler An annotation interface that may be attached to a method to designate it as a command handler.
